text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Victory expected soo, Thanks to the strong leadership of @NYGovCuomo the Governors Council of State Governors have lead the United States in battling against the coronavirus. To the trump administration as usual , here's your participation trophy🏆for barely being in the game.
